channel.title: Fixed. But another error
channel.description:
FIXED.
To all who also have this problem, go into your client.java and search "Official Client". Then remove this code...
[code] if (UID != 59145243) { Send("You aren't on the official client, please download it off the website.");[/code]
EDIT: I fixed that problem, but when I log on, it still auto-kicks me. Any help?

item.title: Fixed. But another error
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:2, topic:283171”]Why would you remove that code?

Now people would be able to go on Different Clients (Hacked Ones, for Botting)[/quote]

I have no idea how to change it for my client. And I still can’t log on my server anyways, so they can’t get on.

Read full topic

To all who also have this problem, go into your client.java and search “Official Client”. Then remove this code…

if (UID != 59145243) { Send("You aren't on the official client, please download it off the website.");
